descriptionHtml:
I always thought the Imperial sword looked a little meh, and all the retexs on the nexus never really did it for me, so I made this one. I wasn\'t really planning on releasing it, but a friend said I should. This seems to be the case for a lot of people I\'ve noticed. My favorite part about this is the Damascus blade and the Sapphire hilt. xD

To install just drop data into......well.....your Skyrim folder. I shouldn\'t have to say this, really.

If you want to edit this further, or if this inspires you, feel free to do whatever the hell you want with it.
author: FiddyStizzlez
